Chinese.name: 图像压缩
Chinese.description: 本示例配置了 COS 触发器，当有图片上传到对应的 COS bucket时，会触发云函数执行，并把文件下载到本地临时目录进行压缩处理，压缩后的图片会上传到另外一个bucket中。
Chinese.attention: 该云函数需要配置 COS 触发器，另外在使用本示例代码时需要在函数里修改 appid、secret_id、secret_key、需要接收压缩后图片的bucket。

English.name: Thumbnail
English.description: This demo need to config COS trigger. When object has been upload to COS bucket, the SCF will download it to /tmp and compress it.
English.attention: You should config COS trigger before you use it. Please change the appid,secret_id,secret_key
